title: Which domain should I choose for software development?
description: The first question that comes to mind when embarking on a software development journey is, Which domain should I choose for software development? Here are some common domains in software development: 1) Web development 2) Mobile development 3) Desktop developmen 4) Game development 5) AIML, etc. The first thing you need to keep in mind is that this is not your final decision for choosing a domain, so don't worry if it changes in the future. In my own journey, in my first year, I was certain I wanted to start with web development, and I did. But after some time, I found mobile development to be a very attractive domain. I decided to shift to mobile development, but then I saw Java Language in my college course and explored the Spring and Spring Boot frameworks. I liked all the functions of these frameworks and decided to learn them for web development. Currently, I am very dedicated to Spring Boot and have been working on it for the past 5-6 months. This is not a unique journey; it happens to all developers. So, be cool. If you are starting from scratch and have enough time, I suggest you spend 15 to 20 days exploring all domains. See which domain fits you well and gives you the most interest to explore further.
